alert.note: Alert for East Baton Rouge; East Feliciana; Pointe Coupee; West Baton Rouge; West Feliciana (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 3:58PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central West Feliciana, north central West Baton Rouge, east central Pointe Coupee, southwestern East Feliciana and northwestern East Baton Rouge Parishes through 430 PM CDT... At 358 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near St. Francisville, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Zachary, New Roads, Jackson, St. Francisville, Slaughter and Wakefield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for southeastern Louisiana.

area.areaDesc: East Baton Rouge; East Feliciana; Pointe Coupee; West Baton Rouge; West Feliciana
